content: The link will be deleted permanently. You will not be able to undo this action.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when deleting a shared link in a public or custom room. It informs users that the deletion action is permanent and irreversible.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'سيتم حذف الرابط نهائيا لن تتمكن من التراجع عن هذا الإجراء' is a literal translation but sounds slightly unnatural in Arabic. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the finality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: سيتم حذف الرابط بشكل نهائي ولن يكون بالإمكان استرجاعه.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Link həmişəlik silinəcək. Bu əməliyyatı geri qaytara bilməzsiniz." is a generally accurate translation, but 'geri qaytara bilməzsiniz' is a bit literal and sounds slightly awkward in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing for 'You will not be able to undo this action' would be 'Bu hərəkəti arxa돌urmaq mümkün deyil' or 'Bu hərəkəti ləğv etmək mümkün deyil'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Bu hərəkəti arxa돌urmaq mümkün deyil' or 'Bu hərəkəti ləğv etmək mümkün deyil' for a more natural and idiomatic rendering.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "The link will be deleted permanently" is not perfectly captured by "링크가 영구적으로 삭제됩니다." While the meaning is similar, a more natural and precise translation would be something like "링크가 영구히 삭제되어집니다." or "링크는 영구적으로 삭제됩니다."
The English phrase "You will not be able to undo this action" is not perfectly captured by "이 작업은 실행 취소할 수 없습니다." A more natural phrasing would be "이 작업은 되돌릴 수 없습니다."
The English phrase "permanently" is better conveyed with a more emphatic term in Latvian, given the severity of the action. "Neatgriezeniski" is correct but could be strengthened.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Saite tiks dzēsta pavisam neatgriezeniski. Šo darbību nevarēsiet atcelt.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'şters' is a valid spelling, but 'șters' is the more common and preferred spelling in modern Romanian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Link-ul va fi șters definitiv. Această acțiune nu poate fi anulată.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ක්‍රියාව' (kriyawa) is a bit formal for this context. A more common and accessible word would be better.
While grammatically correct, 'ඔබට මෙම ක්‍රියාව අහෝසි කිරීමට නොහැකි වනු ඇත' sounds slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබට මෙම ක්‍රියාව අහෝසි කිරීමට නොහැකි වනු ඇත --> ඔබට මෙය අවමඟුලක් කිරීමට බැරිවනු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'линк' is often used informally. A more formal and accurate translation of 'link' would be 'веза'.
Agreement error: The verb 'бити' needs to agree in gender and number with 'веза'. Since 'веза' is feminine singular, it should be 'биће', not 'бити'.
The verb 'бити' is not necessary. A more concise translation would omit it.
